info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 10 at 11:10PM CDT until May 11 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN COTTLE...NORTHEASTERN MOTLEY AND SOUTHERN HALL COUNTIES... At 1110 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles west of Northfield to 8 miles south of Cee Vee, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Turkey, Northfield, and Cee Vee. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
